channel.title: White Line Splits my Screen Diagonally
channel.description: When I play, there is a white line that splits my screen in half diagonally. This happens instead of the crosshair showing. This could be related to some missing textures. I would like to reinstall as a last resort, it took almost half an hour on the first install (though I wasn't torrenting...). Please help.

item.title: White Line Splits my Screen Diagonally
item.dc:creator: Port_A_Build
item.description:
No, that was me setting the DirectX version to 8, thinking it would give me a performance boost like it did in TF2. Thanks for the info.

Read full topic
item.source: White Line Splits my Screen Diagonally

item.title: White Line Splits my Screen Diagonally
item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
Directx issue:

Your pc has installed an old version of directx.

Check if your GPU supports directx 9.0, if yes download it.

If no try to uncheck the post processing on the hud, the bloom fx and lower the graphical settings (for instance HDR antialiasing etc… )

If you google your problem, you’ll find that is quite common, especially with SFM.
I’m sure that if here you won’t find a solution, something will pop-in with a simple search.

Read full topic
item.source: White Line Splits my Screen Diagonally
